attributes.action: Fund The Renovation Of Maryport Senhouse Mansion In Cumbria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I live in maryport, and sadly, a great landmark in our beloved town has fallen to decay over the years. I see this as ill-treatment of such a once stately home of our town founders. Hopefully, with some backing from the general public, and The Prime Minister Mr Gordon Brown, we could embrace this building once more, and for the first time in decades, see this landmark breath new life for future generations to see. Hopefully also, it would boost tourism to maryport, a much needed attribute in our town. Thank You...
